findings.title: sendPresale issues with OUT_OF_GAS exception
findings.description: The function sendPresale() uses a loop to distribute values from the values list to recipients from the recipients list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: sendPresale function does not check recipients list length and values list length
findings.description: The function sendPresale() do not check recipients list length and values list length with each other to avoid mismatch.

findings.title: Rounding errors due to division before multiplication
findings.description: In Solidity, performing division before multiplication can lead to rounding errors since there are no floating points.
